name: Dodge Prototype
description:
arrow keys or tap to move p to pause

press space or double tap to use your ability

WASD, arrow keys, and mobile-friendly.

abilities are in skins, Press / to use commands

the shop and modes currently don't work

because of timers there is an empty time when it starts

Music: @-Multinia- and remixes of undertale/deltarune songs

You can play and edit the game from https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/563341642/
